title: Drawing, "Oval Table with Glass Top", August 23, 1932
medium: Graphite, black ink, and red color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, center right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, center right: 50/FS/NETy/8/23/32; below stamp: Approved for Construction/Englishman (?)/-DSS; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite and red color pencil
description: Perspective, plan and elevation drawings for oval table. Top of table in glass; four squared, straight metal legs that become stretcher/base at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Oval Table with Glass Top", August 23, 1932.
August 23, 1932. Graphite, black ink, and red color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-652.
